title: A proposal to perform musick in perfect and mathematical proportions containing I. the state of musick in general, II. the principles of present practice ..., III. the tables of proportions, calculated for the viol ... / by Thomas Salmon ... ; with large remarks upon this whole treatise by the reverend and learned John Wallis ...
author: Salmon, Thomas, 1648-1706.
notes: Advertisement: p. [12] and p. [1]-[2] at end.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
